summary: This is an email from a government attorney to Roy and Jack, asserting that a signed, binding agreement with Jeffrey Epstein exists and requesting notification of the date and time of his change of plea and sentencing.

persons.name: Roy
persons.context: Addressed in an email from a government attorney regarding the Jeffrey Epstein agreement and upcoming plea/sentencing.

persons.name: Jack
persons.context: Addressed in an email from a government attorney regarding the Jeffrey Epstein agreement and upcoming plea/sentencing.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email references a signed, binding agreement involving him and an upcoming change of plea and sentencing.

connections.description: Both are recipients of the same government correspondence regarding the Jeffrey Epstein legal agreement.

events.title: Government asserts binding Epstein agreement
events.description: A government attorney emails Roy and Jack to state that a signed, binding agreement with Jeffrey Epstein exists and to request notification of his plea and sentencing date.

events.title: Upcoming Epstein plea and sentencing
events.description: The email references an impending change of plea and sentencing for Jeffrey Epstein, for which the government requests the date and time.

keyFacts: The government asserts the existence of a signed, binding agreement related to Jeffrey Epstein as of June 2008.
The correspondence indicates an upcoming change of plea and sentencing for Jeffrey Epstein was anticipated.
The email is directed to individuals named Roy and Jack, who appear to be involved in the legal proceedings.
